definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: Children have higher level of empathy response in the situations of negative empathy.
sentences.chinese: 负性共情时儿童会表现出更高水平的共情反应。

sentences.english: Children have higher level of empathy response in the situations of negative empathy.
sentences.chinese: 负性共情时儿童会表现出更高水平的共情反应。

sentences.english: Medical student self-reported levels of empathy tend to decrease with time spent in medical training.
sentences.chinese: 训练时间越长，医学生自述共情水平趋于下降。

sentences.english: Many definitions have been given of the term and I myself have set forth several.
sentences.chinese: 共情这个词有过很多定义，我自己也提过好几个定义。

sentences.english: Anterior cingulate Empathy, affect, decision making, cognitive control.
sentences.chinese: 前扣带回共情，情感，决策，认知控制。

sentences.english: The predominant emphasis is on unfinished business, empty-chair dialogue, within an empathic, relational context.
sentences.chinese: 强调的重点是共情关系情境下的未完成和空椅对话。

sentences.english: The highest expression of empathy is accepting and nonjudgmental.
sentences.chinese: 最高水平的共情表达是接受的和非评判的。

definition: to feel as if it had happened to oneself/to sympathize/(polite expression of gratitude for a favor received by a friend etc) I take it as a personal favor
to shift one's affection/to change sentiment
to put oneself in sb else's shoes
